alert.note: Alert for Brown (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 8:05PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River Above Springfield. * WHEN...From late Sunday night until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 630 PM CDT Saturday, the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 25.5 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.7 feet on 06/19/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
